1.16.4.1.16.4-2.0.21:
- GUI: added debug frame display. When turned on, the bounding box of the control under the mouse cursor is highlighted with a white frame
- Added the /zerocore command (and /zc alias). Currently it's used to enable/disable the GUI debug frame and to manually send a clear-recipe-cache request to all clients
- Increased the hit box of the up-down buttons. Close ER #37. Thanks to beiai for the report
- BakedModelSupplier is now deprecated and will be removed in a future release. A mod should now use it's own instance(s) of ModBakedModelSupplier instead
- Bumped version to 2.0.21
- Compatible with MC 1.16.4 and 1.16.5. Use the same .jar.

1.16.5.1.16.4-2.0.21:
- GUI: added debug frame display. When turned on, the bounding box of the control under the mouse cursor is highlighted with a white frame
- Added the /zerocore command (and /zc alias). Currently it's used to enable/disable the GUI debug frame and to manually send a clear-recipe-cache request to all clients
- Increased the hit box of the up-down buttons. Close ER #37. Thanks to beiai for the report
- BakedModelSupplier is now deprecated and will be removed in a future release. A mod should now use it's own instance(s) of ModBakedModelSupplier instead
- Bumped version to 2.0.21
- Compatible with MC 1.16.4 and 1.16.5. Use the same .jar.
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.0:
- Dropped support for Minecraft 1.16.4
- Multiblock API: many performance improvements that considerably lower the times needed to load and assemble a multiblock structure from scratch (during chunk loading) or while building it even for huge structures while generally keeping the old API contract and two-sides handling of your multiblocks. Having said so, this is still a braking change from previous versions.
- AbstractModBlockEntity : the DataUpdate event is now deprecated and will be replaced in a future version with a new update notification mechanism that do not need a full IEvent for every TileEntity even if notifications are not needed. Also, changes to the Event class in this release almost drop to zero it's memory usage when it has no subscribers
- Removed some deprecated methods
- General speed and memory optimizations in the whole codebase
- Bumped version to 2.1.0
- Updated Minecraft to version 1.16.5
- Updated Forge to version 36.2.0
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.3:
- Added base class for recipe providers. Fix ER #41
- Fixed some srg names after changing mappings
- Bumped version to 2.1.3
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.4:
- Tweaks to the recipe system and the ability to get vanilla Ingredients from our recipes (eg: JEI)
- Added JEI compat support and IDrawable wrappers for ISprite and such
- GUI: new StaticSlot slot type
- More data helper methods for ISyncableEntity
- Misc: various new helper methods and classes (see github)
- Bumped version to 1.16.5-2.1.4
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.6:
- Added IMultiblockPartType2 to automate block/tiles parts creation removing duplicated code from the derived enums
- Added IPartCollection to manage small collections of parts that could often be empty
- Multiblock: don't rebuild the bounding box of a multiblock if not necessary
- ModBlock extended properties (support for ItemStack-storable TE data)
- ItemHelper: added ITEM+SIZE common match pattern
- Adding missing energy handlers for new the wide energy API
- GUI / RichText : make sure all lines are split at each newline
- GUI: added AnchoredLayoutEngine
- GUI: Container data sync. Added data binding support directly to the ModContainerScreen
- GUI: Reworked databinding internals. Deprecated the old stuff. Add your binding directly from the Screen
- GUI: added ItemStack-like display for items to the Static control
- GUI: Orientation-aware controls. Horizontal gauge bar
- Fix corner-case crash for TextureAtlasSprites that are stitched at zero-coordinates
- Fix crash when running alongside a Sodium fork. Thanks to KitsuneAlex for the fix
- Bumped version to 2.1.6
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.7:
- Fix NPE on getMaxCapacity(). Close #9. Thanks to AnCasper for the report.
- Added a way to check if an ingredient match while ignoring the ingredient amount
- Bumped version to 2.1.7
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.9:
- Multiblock API: Fix bounding box not being updated on assimilation
- Updated Forge to version 36.2.20 (cfr [CVE-2021-44228])
- Bumped version to 2.1.9
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.16:
- Fix multiblock assembly in corer cases before opt2 is merged in
- Updated Forge to version 36.2.27
- Bumped version to 2.1.16
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.17:
- This should fix the crash that happens after a block is highlighted when a error is displayed in the GUI. Probable fix for ER #83, 81, 63
- Bumped version to 2.1.17
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.22:
- Allow JEI plugin to use non vanilla recipes
- Bumped version to 2.1.22
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.23:
- Fix CuboidBoundingBox expansion (ported from opt-2). This should fix problems with multiblocks not always assembly correctly. Thanks to Jonh09 for the report
- Bumped version to 2.1.23
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.26:
- Fix error messages not being displayed on the correct client in lan games
- Updated Forge to version 36.2.34
- Updated JEI to version 7.7.1.152
- Updated Patchouli to version 1.16.4-53.3
- Updated CC:Tweaked to version 1.100.10
- Bumped version to 2.1.26
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.28:
- GUI : added custom themes support. The colours used by the GUI controls are now loaded from a JSON theme file. This will allow modders to support multiple switchable themes in their mods that could also be modified by resource packs authors.
- GUI : textual controls will now use the enabled/disabled text colours from the currently active theme unless a custom text colour is set
- Bumped version to 2.1.28
1.16.5.1.16.5-2.1.29:
- Patchouli compat : fix problems with tooltips in custom crafting pages. Close ER #40. Thanks to jajajafeti and macks2008 for the report.
- Bumped version to 2.1.29

- GUI control : added versions of controlToScreen() / screenToControl() for arrays of doubles
- Bumped version to 2.1.30

- Some ground works for the next ER update

- Bumped version to 2.1.34

1.20.1.1.20.1-2.1.43:
- Reworked internal code for common machines/containers/screens
- Backported service compat support from 1.20.6
- GUI: new data binding system
- GUI: the debug hover frame now display the control position and size if shilt is held pressed
- GUI: AnchoredLayoutEngine now center horizontally controls with a Top or Bottom layout hint
- GUI: VerticalLayoutEngine and HorizontalLayoutEngine now honor the vertical / horizontal aligment setting of the layout engine
- GUI: added HelpButton variant to show JEI recipes
- Added FluidTankRenderer

- Updated SI prefixes

1.20.1.1.20.1-2.1.45:
- Forge only init capabilities for BucketItem so let's init them ourself. Closes ER #160
- Bumped version 2.1.45
1.20.1.1.20.1-2.1.46:
- Reset shader colour after paint a solid rect / triangle. Closes ER #172
- Bumped version to 2.1.46
1.20.1.1.20.1-2.1.47:
- (Neo)Forge has an issue where it provides incorrect, empty ModelData when fall damage particles are requested for ModelData-aware blocks (see https://github.com/neoforged/NeoForge/issues/1629). To address this, a fallback ModelData option has been added, which will be used in cases where the requested ModelData returns empty.
- Bumped version to 2.1.47
